belongs_to_collection.name: Is It Easy To Be Young? Collection

overview: The film is a sequel of the legendary documentary “Is It Easy To Be Young?”, which was created in the year 1986 by Juris Podnieks. You once again meet the heroes from the first film. How their lives have changed, have their dreams fulfilled?  The film received prize in Leipzig film festival, FIPRESSI prize, nominated for Prix Europa.
title: Is It Easy To Be...? After 10 Years
